User Interface.name: User Interface
requirements: Allow users to search for books
Enable users to maintain their private library
Allow users to share book reviews

Admin Interface.name: Admin Interface
requirements: Allow admins to grant users access to books
Allow admins to open user accounts
Allow admins to close user accounts
Enable admins to block user accounts

Backup System.name: Backup System
requirements: Schedule regular backups of the entire data
Enable restoration of entire data or specific user's account
Allow replay of transactions of the entire site or single user after a restore
